channel.title: PerfectionX-we have now got fullscreen!--need beta testers
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i8x1cy.png[/img] [b][size=36pt]Fullscreen= yes![/size][/b] [size=36pt][b]Server Status = still in development Important: we have now got enough coder, please do not apply if u are a novice coder. If you would like to be staff, please post here. Thankyou[/b][/size] [center][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/15hkg0n.png[/img][/center] Hello everyone, my name is [b]Prototype[/b]. I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, [b]PerfectionX[/b]. As you can tell by the title we are aiming for this server to be [b]perfect[/b]. Originally [b]PerfectionX[/b], was not going to be released. This was as it was a project for me to learn from, but it is turning and '[b]perfectly[/b]'. I have managed to obtain a hoster, so at the movement the beta's going to be released next week. Hopefully, the full server would be released a few days before Christmas. We are going to make it Christmas related for December but then we are going to start on the hard stuff.
[b]By hard stuff I mean:[/b] [ul][li]Summoning[/li] [li]construction[/li] [li]Dungeenering[/li] [li]hunter[/li] [li]full screen[/li] [li]all bosses[/li][/ul]
[hr] Pics ( these are taken by Sophie but nonetheless they are still of the server: [IMG]http://imgur.com/XH4mG.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/UxRHl.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/BbEzW.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/TzQgv.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/B9Kd9.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/Jkvjc.png[/img] Here are some things about the server:
[b]What base have used for PerfectionX?[/b] We have used gserver, it is be '[b]unique[/b]'. [b]What is PerfectionX?[/b] It's the [b]perfect[/b] RSPS. [b]What would we like to have in the server in the short term?[/b] GWD,other dungeons, all bosses, claws,vls,stat, other weps,custom Armour, clan wars,jad,pits and other mini-games,perfection points. [b]How many people do we want playing?[/b] 1500 <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG [b]How are we going to achieve this?[/b] Top-lists,web-client,advertisement and some thing secret shhhhh.... [b]What do we want to achieve from the server?[/b] Personally I would like to achieve many types of accomplishments. I would like to have the following: [ul][li]Perfect economy;[/li] [li]fully working summoning;[/li] [li]fully working construction;[/li] [li]fully working dungeenering(first ever);[/li] [li]all quests from the real RS.[/li] [li]all the minigames[/li] [li]all the new bosses[/li][/ul]
Now my friends i want to notify you about one thing we as a community can, we can make this work. My friends, you will soon see us at the top of all. [hr] At the moment what we have in-terms of skills(Red= not started,Orange= on the way, Green= finished) : Attack Magic Thieving Smithing Dungeenering Strength Rune-crafting Crafting Fishing Construction Defense Hit-points Fletching Fire-making summoning Range Agility Slayer Woodcutting Prayer Mining Farming Herblore [hr] Ok what we are looking for is: server Coders Web designer Webclient maker client coders beta testers [hr] Terms: If your would like to apply please make sure that you are dedicated, we do not want people that will leave after a day. Also make sure that you are kind of mature and you do not fight with other people, we do not want fights between staff members. All developers will have a custom green crown just like the administrates one but in green. [code]Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose PerfectionX? By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: [/code] [hr] [b]I will post your application status HERE please check here:[/b] [hr] Positions At the moment: Owner: me co owner: dennis Website designer:pluvia gfx designer:Krack Kid head coder:(still not decided) coder:Josh coder:zachary coder:uncalled junior coder:--- junior coder:--- Advertisement: a lot of people = ) [hr] if you do like our server please use this in your signatures everywhere. [center][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/mmvjo0.png[/img][/center] [hr] Thankyou Krack Kid

item.dc:creator: @julesrules11 julesrules11
item.description:
@julesrules11 wrote:

Name:Timezone:GMT +10

Job wanted:Mod

Why do i think i desverve it im 18 year old and been playing runescape for 10 years Helpful and ingame and out of game Allway active online don’t ever give up.Help anyone if needed can host cool events.i can do some codeing and i can do make websites and forums and chats heaps of stuff
Any past experience?Yes have had 2 pass mod roles but the owner given up
Why you chose PerfectionX?By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned:Yes
I choose this because it looks like this server has something more then any other place i have been on its look very nice graphics this server looks like it can go somewhere

if you like to chat add me on msn
Jules101.rules101@hotmail.com

item.title: PerfectionX-we have now got fullscreen!--need beta testers
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Name: Justin Persinger

Timezone: USA MNT (GMT -7:00)

Job wanted: Web Designer, Junior Coder, Beta Tester. (Web Designer most, the other two are other positions I could resort to.)

Any past experience?: Plenty. I’ve made at least 20 websites, have Beta Tested my own servers, and have coded at least 10 servers. <-Fully coded by me.

Why you chose PerfectionX?: I would love to help this server reach the top, as I feel it will climb the ranks very quickly. Also, it has a marvelous idea behind it. No other RSPS has ever been entirely ‘perfect’.

By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes.

Other-
MSN: Justin.persinger@gmail.com
PM/Send me a message on MSN to talk. :]

Read full topic

item.title: PerfectionX-we have now got fullscreen!--need beta testers
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Name: Alex

Timezone: GMT-7

Job wanted: Web designer

Any past experience?: When it comes to web design and development, I have an extensive amount of experience. If you add me on MSN or shoot me a private message, I’ll be more than happy to link you to some examples of my work, or perhaps even whip something up quickly and give you a quick preview of what I have the ability to do in a short period of time. Although I’ve only been on the web design scene since 2008, I’ve acquired tons of knowledge and I’ve been looking for a project to keep me occupied while I continue to study and test on my own forum. Despite me having my own forum, which is just a discussion forum, so it doesn’t take much to watch over it, I’ll be able to dedicate almost all of my time to PerfectionX.

Why you chose PerfectionX?: I chose PerfectionX because it looks absolute amazing already and there’s still a lot to do. In addition to this, I can tell a lot of work is being put into the development of PerfectionX and that’s what I like to see, hard work. Regardless if I become PerfectionX’s web designer, I hope PerfectionX goes a long way and I’ll be sure to be an active contributor in any and every way.

By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes

If you’d like to chat with me over MSN, feel free to send me an invite: alex.amayzing@hotmail.com

If not, shoot me a private message.

Edit: After going back and reading through some of the posts, I realized that the web designer position has already been filled. If you ever need a backup or perhaps even two web designers to work together, feel free to contact me, I’m almost always free, especially since I’m no longer playing basketball, all of my current time is dedicated to school… But really, who wants to do school work 24/7? I’d much rather help someone else out while also doing something I really enjoy doing.

Read full topic
